markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Topple Foe](/Feats.aspx?ID=2014) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 181 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=66)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2005); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Trigger**
An ally succeeds at a melee Strike against an opponent you are both adjacent to.

</column>

---

You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) the target of the triggering attack.
name: Topple Foe
